sentences.english: Even when we reduce the salt to a fine powder , it will taste well.
sentences.chinese: 即使我们把盐研磨成很小的粉末，他尝起来还是咸的。

sentences.english: He discovered, by some accident, that flesh roasted in front of afire tasted better.
sentences.chinese: 他意外地发现，在火前烤过的肉尝起来更好。

sentences.english: You can taste the wind and rain of India's stormy season in each cup through its earthiness .
sentences.chinese: 尝起来有土味，能闻到印度多雨季节风和雨的味道。

sentences.english: I think you cooked this chicken too long. It tastes really dry.
sentences.chinese: 我认为你煮鸡煮得太久了，尝起来真的好干。

sentences.english: and you can eat some of the barley-sugar window, it tastes so nice.
sentences.chinese: 你可以吃一些麦芽糖做的窗户，它尝起来太美味了。

sentences.english: The guests left most of the dishes untouched, because they didn't taste delicious.
sentences.chinese: 客人们没有动大部分菜，因为它们尝起来味道不咋样。

sentences.english: The dish sells like fish, but tastes like beef.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜闻起来像鱼，尝起来像牛肉。

sentences.english: Thee dish sells like fish, but tastes like beef.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜闻起来像鱼，尝起来像牛肉。

sentences.english: You've tasted bitter defeat and the sweet success.
sentences.chinese: 你尝尽了失败的痛楚，成功的喜悦。

sentences.english: We drink, and it tastes divine.
sentences.chinese: 我们喝下去，它尝起来是神圣的。

sentences.english: Cants have no ability to taste sweet things.
Encourage everyone to smell and taste the wines and jot down their impressions.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励每个人都闻和尝这些葡萄酒并写下他们的感觉。

sentences.english: How does this soup taste? It tastes a little salty.
sentences.chinese: 这汤尝起来怎么样？有点咸。

sentences.english: Churine (548): The leaf from its head, when chewed, is extremely bitter, but it has the effect of energizing a tired body.
sentences.chinese: 在它头上的叶子尝起来非常苦，但是会给予人力量。
